title: (x) Burn After Reading Type? - custom lettering by Erik Buckham, alternatives {Corey H, Yves, Stephen C}
content:
Does anyone know what font is on this move poster for Burn After Reading?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032217im_/http:/typophile.com/files/burn-after-reading-poster_6581.jpg)
author: christa317

comments.content: I don't think this is a font, all the A's and O's are different to begin with.
It's custom lettering drawn in Photoshop by the talented [Erik Buckham.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032217/http:/www.seabuck.net/)

If you're looking for fonts similar to that style of lettering please check this [FontList](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032217/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontcase/genres/handmade_handdrawn_papercut/).

And if you're ever looking for type or lettering used on movie posters, maybe first [search](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032217/http:/fontfeed.com/?s=+Burn+after+reading&submit=Go) the [ScreenFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032217/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/tag/movie-posters/) archive. It was featured in the [September](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032217/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/characters-on-the-silver-screen-september-11-2008/) episode.
